description: The issue observed involves a newly opened and fully updated Dell Latitude 5540 notebook running Windows 11, which has resulted in the presence of two recovery partitions after a factory installation. This anomaly raises questions regarding the normal system configuration as typically one recovery partition should suffice for restoring the operating system. The concern is compounded by the fact that this device had never been domain joined and had been updated by Microsoft and Dell, suggesting a potential misconfiguration or unexpected behavior arising from the update process.
